translated: In this way, there is eloquence about form, eloquence about sound, eloquence about smell, eloquence about taste, eloquence about touch, eloquence about phenomena, eloquence about generosity, eloquence about discipline, eloquence about patience,🔽eloquence about diligence, eloquence about concentration, eloquence about insight, eloquence about the desire realm, eloquence about the form realm, eloquence about the formless realm, eloquence about giving instructions,

original: kha ton bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: kha ton bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang /
translated: eloquence about recitation, eloquence about service, eloquence about the applications of mindfulness, eloquence about the right efforts, eloquence about the bases of supernatural power, eloquence about the faculties,

original: stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
analyzed: stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
translated: the eloquence of power, the eloquence of the branches of enlightenment, the eloquence of the path, the eloquence of concentration, the eloquence of liberation, the eloquence of meditative stabilization, the eloquence of meditative absorption,🔽the eloquence of inner emptiness, the eloquence of outer emptiness, the eloquence of inner and outer emptiness, the eloquence of the emptiness of emptiness, the eloquence of great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
translated: the eloquence of ultimate emptiness, the eloquence of conditioned emptiness, the eloquence of unconditioned emptiness, the eloquence of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the eloquence of the emptiness of the beginning and end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /🔽dngos po med pa @70a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa @70a *//
translated: the eloquence of the emptiness of non-rejection, the eloquence of the emptiness of nature, the eloquence of the emptiness of all phenomena, the eloquence of the emptiness of its own mark, the eloquence of the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the eloquence of the emptiness of non-things,

original: stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang /
translated: the eloquence of the emptiness of essential nature, the eloquence of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things, the eloquence of the perfection of generosity, the eloquence of the perfection of moral discipline,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang /
translated: the eloquence of the perfection of patience, the eloquence of the perfection of perseverance, the eloquence of the perfection of concentration, the eloquence of the perfection of wisdom, the eloquence of the ten powers,

original: mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /
translated: the eloquence of the four fearlessnesses, the eloquence of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eloquence of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the eloquence of the result of stream enterer, the eloquence of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the eloquence of the result of non-returner, the eloquence of the state of a worthy one, the eloquence of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and the eloquence of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is the purification of the unutterable.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is inconceivable.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is without a basis.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med ba'o //🔽rab 'byor / shes rab @70b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med ba'o // rab 'byor / shes rab @70b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is without production and without stopping.🔽Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is without defilement and without purification.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o // rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is without decrease and without increase.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is without being and without nonbeing.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: Subhuti: The perfection of wisdom is without objective support.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, why is that?

original: chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te /
analyzed: chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te /
translated: Those dharmas do not exist in this profound perfection of wisdom, and they are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, if, when those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle are writing out this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na /
analyzed: chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na /
translated: they are disturbed by those dharmas,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //🔽de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle will have a deed of Māra.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhūti said this to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam /
translated: can the perfection of wisdom be written?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta ma yin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it cannot.”

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The intrinsic reality of the perfection of wisdom does not exist;

original: mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs so //
translated: it is not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The intrinsic reality of the perfection of meditative absorption does not exist;

original: mi dmigs so //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol @71a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs so // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol @71a *//
translated: it is not apprehended.

original: tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The intrinsic reality of the perfection of perseverance does not exist;

original: mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs so //
translated: it is not apprehended.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The intrinsic reality of the perfection of patience does not exist;

original: mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs so //
translated: it is not apprehended.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The intrinsic reality of the perfection of ethical discipline does not exist;

original: mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs so //
translated: it is not apprehended.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The intrinsic reality of the perfection of generosity does not exist;

original: mi dmigs so //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs so // nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so // phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: it is not apprehended.🔽The intrinsic reality of inner emptiness does not exist; it is not apprehended.🔽The intrinsic reality of outer emptiness does not exist; it is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic reality of inner and outer emptiness does not exist; it is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yong pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yong pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the great does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of a basic nature does not have a real essence, because it is not apprehended.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena does not exist as an intrinsic essence and is not apprehended.

original: rang gi @71b mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi @71b mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics does not exist as an intrinsic essence and is not apprehended.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of nonapprehension does not exist as an intrinsic essence and is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of nonentities does not exist as an intrinsic essence and is not apprehended.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature does not exist as an intrinsic essence and is not apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities does not exist as an intrinsic essence and is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The essential nature of the applications of mindfulness does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The essential nature of the right efforts does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the bases of supernatural powers does not exist and is not found.

original: dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the faculties does not exist and is not found.

original: stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the powers does not exist and is not found.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the branches of awakening does not exist and is not found.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the noble eightfold path does not exist and is not found.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //🔽bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so // bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the noble truths does not exist and is not found.🔽The nature of the meditative stabilities does not exist and is not found.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so; ;gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so; ;gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the formless absorptions does not exist and is not found.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the liberations does not exist and is not found.

original: mthar @72a *// gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mthar @72a *// gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the concentrations and formless absorptions does not exist and is not found.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation does not exist and is not found.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the clairvoyances does not exist and is not found.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the meditative stabilities does not exist and is not found.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the dhāraṇī gateways does not exist and is not found.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The nature of the powers of the tathāgatas does not exist and is not found. The nature of the fearlessnesses does not exist and is not found.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the analytical knowledges does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of great compassion does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the distinct attributes of a buddha does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the knowledge of all aspects does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the knowledge of paths does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the knowledge of all aspects does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The nonapprehension of an intrinsic nature is a nonexistence.

original: dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: That nonexistence is the perfection of wisdom.

original: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi @72b nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi @72b nus so //
translated: A nonexistent cannot diminish a nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'du shes na /
translated: Subhūti, if sons or daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas perceive this profound perfection of wisdom as a non-entity,

original: de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: that should be known as the work of Māra.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas /
translated: if some sons or daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas write out this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na /
translated: and say, ‘I have written out this profound perfection of wisdom,’

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te /
translated: that is because they are attached to the letters of this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Blessed One,🔽the perfection of wisdom is without letters.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration is without letters.

original: brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is without syllables.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is without syllables.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is without syllables.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is without syllables.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: form is without syllables.

original: tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // 'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Feeling is without syllables.🔽Perception is without syllables.

original: 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o; ;rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o; ;rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Formations are without syllables. Consciousness is without syllables.

original: mig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mig ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The eyes are without syllables.

original: rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The ears are without syllables.🔽The nose is without syllables.

original: lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The tongue is without syllables.

original: @73a *// lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: @73a *// lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The body is without syllables.

original: yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The mind is without syllables.

original: gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Form is without syllables.

original: sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Sound is without syllables.

original: dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: smell is without syllables,🔽taste is without syllables,

original: reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: touch is without syllables,

original: chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: and mental objects are without syllables.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is without syllables,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma /
translated: ear consciousness is without syllables,🔽nose consciousness is without syllables,🔽tongue consciousness is without syllables,

original: mchis pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mchis pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: body consciousness is without syllables,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: and mind consciousness is without syllables.🔽Eye contact is without syllables,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: ear contact is without syllables,🔽nose contact is without syllables,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: tongue contact is without syllables,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: body contact is without syllables,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: and mind contact is without syllables.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Contact at the eye is without syllables.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Contact at the ear is without syllables.🔽Contact at the nose is without syllables.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Contact at the tongue is without syllables.🔽Contact at the body is without syllables.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽@73b sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // @73b sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Contact at the mind is without syllables.🔽The earth element is without syllables.

original: chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The water element is without syllables.

original: me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The fire element is without syllables.🔽The wind element is without syllables.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The space element is without syllables.🔽The consciousness element is without syllables.

original: ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is without syllables.

original: 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: volitional factors are not a syllable.🔽consciousness is not a syllable.

original: rnam par ma shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o; ;ming dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par ma shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o; ;ming dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: name-and-form is not a syllable.

original: skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: the six sense fields are not a syllable.

original: reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: contact is not a syllable.

original: tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: feeling is not a syllable.🔽craving is not a syllable.

original: sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o; ;len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o; ;len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: grasping is not a syllable.🔽becoming is not a syllable.

original: skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: birth is not a syllable.

original: rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: aging and death is not a syllable.🔽inner emptiness is not a syllable.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: outer emptiness is not a syllable.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: inner and outer emptiness is not a syllable.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: emptiness of emptiness is not a syllable.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: great emptiness is not a syllable.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: ultimate emptiness is not a syllable.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is not a syllable.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not a syllable.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits is not a syllable.🔽The emptiness of what has no beginning or end is not a syllable.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi @74a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi @74a *//
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection is not a syllable.

original: ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is not a syllable.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not a syllable.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is not a syllable.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension is not a syllable.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings is not a syllable.🔽The emptiness of essence is not a syllable.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essence of nonthings is not a syllable.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not letters.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams mi yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The right efforts are not letters.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //🔽dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o // dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are not letters.🔽The faculties are not letters.

original: stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The powers are not letters.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are not letters.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is not letters.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The truths are not letters.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The concentrations are not letters.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The immeasurables are not letters.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The formless absorptions are not letters.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The deliverances are not letters.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The serial absorptions are not letters.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are without syllables.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The superknowledges are without syllables.

original: ting @74b nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: ting @74b nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are without syllables.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are without syllables.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are without syllables.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The fearlessnesses are without syllables.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ga ma mchis pa'o //🔽byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ga ma mchis pa'o // byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are without syllables.🔽Great love is without syllables.

original: snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Great compassion is without syllables.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha are without syllables.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is without syllables.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is without syllables.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is without syllables.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la /
translated: if a son of good family or daughter of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas becomes attached to the perfection of wisdom that is without syllables,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing /
translated: becomes attached to the perfection of concentration that is without syllables,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: becomes attached to the perfection of perseverance that is without syllables, becomes attached to the perfection of patience that is without syllables, becomes attached to the perfection of morality that is without syllables,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / @75a *//
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / @75a *//
translated: becomes attached to the perfection of generosity that is without syllables,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they are fixated on the internal emptiness that is not a word, they are fixated on the external emptiness that is not a word, they are fixated on the external and internal emptiness that is not a word,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they are fixated on the emptiness of emptiness that is not a word, they are fixated on the great emptiness that is not a word, they are fixated on the ultimate emptiness that is not a word,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena that is not a syllable, they become attached to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena that is not a syllable, they become attached to the emptiness of what is beyond extremes that is not a syllable,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless that is not a syllable, they become attached to the emptiness of what is not discarded that is not a syllable, and they become attached to the emptiness of inherent existence that is not a syllable.

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi @75b mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi @75b mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: They are attached to the emptiness of all phenomena that are not letters,🔽they are attached to the emptiness of the intrinsic identity of what is not letters,🔽they are attached to the emptiness of nonapprehension of what is not letters,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they are attached to the emptiness of the absence of things of what is not letters,🔽they are attached to the emptiness of intrinsic identity of what is not letters, and they are attached to the emptiness of the intrinsic identity of the absence of things of what is not letters.

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the signless applications of mindfulness, they become attached to the signless right efforts, they become attached to the signless legs of miraculous power,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags bar bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags bar bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon bar chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the signless faculties, they become attached to the signless powers, they become attached to the signless branches of awakening,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: to the concentrations,🔽to the immeasurables,🔽to the formless absorptions,

original: @76a *// yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: @76a *// yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: to the liberations,

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the formless meditative stabilizations;🔽they become attached to the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are the doors of liberation;

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the superknowledges; they become attached to the meditative stabilizations; they become attached to the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the thusness of the powers, which has no letters; they become attached to the thusness of the fearlessnesses, which has no letters; they become attached to the thusness of the detailed and thorough knowledges, which has no letters;

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis @76b pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i byams pa chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis @76b pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
translated: they become attached to the thusness of great love, which has no letters; they become attached to the thusness of great compassion, which has no letters; they become attached to the thusness of the distinct attributes of a buddha, which has no letters;

original: yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na /
analyzed: yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na /
translated: and they become attached to the knowledge of all modes which is not a letter, and they become attached to the knowledge of the path which is not a letter, and they become attached to the knowledge of all modes which is not a letter.

original: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being should know that these are the works of Mara.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord : So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being should know that these are the works of Mara.

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: The Lord : So it is, Subhuti, so it is.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, when a son or daughter of good family who belongs to the vehicle of the Bodhisattvas writes, or studies, or recites, or hears, or takes up, or bears in mind, or reads this deep perfection of wisdom, then Mara, the Evil One, will try to bring fear to his mind.

original: kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na /
analyzed: kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na /
translated: and when they are properly paying attention to it, and when they are meditating on it, if they generate a lot of mental activity about objects,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this too is the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle are writing out, reading aloud, asking questions about, taking up,

translated: reciting,

analyzed: dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang bsgom pa'i tshe /

translated: “It is to be free of the mental engagements of towns, cities, countries, royal palaces, homes, gurus, preceptors,

analyzed: yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na /
translated: If many other mental activities arise,

translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when the sons and daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas are writing out, reading aloud, reciting, properly paying attention to,

analyzed: pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de //

analyzed: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Those sons of a good family or

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni /

translated: “Subhūti, if sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle think like that, and abandon this deep perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, that also is not a condition for writing, clearly articulating, or chanting this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / tshed du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang /🔽shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang; rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / tshed du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang; rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la /
translated: Subhuti, this also should be known as the work of Mara.🔽Moreover, Subhuti, the expounder of Dharma may know the special qualities of the Dharma, such as the Sutras, the songs, the prophecies, the verses, the declarations, the circumstances, the stories, the exploits,🔽the marvels, the upadeshas, and the established instructions,

original: chos nyan pa ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang; ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /

translated: but the listener may not know the special qualities of the Dharma, such as the Sutras, the songs, the prophecies, the verses, the declarations, the circumstances, the stories, the exploits,🔽the marvels, the upadeshas, and the established instructions.

original: chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa @81b bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na /
analyzed: chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa @81b bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na /
translated: If they do not know the special Dharma of the sutras, the geyas, the vyakarana, the gathas, the udanas, the nidanas, the avadanas, the itivrttakas, the jatakas,🔽the vaipulyas, the adbhutadharmas, the upadeesas, and the dharani gateways,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
translated: then, Subhuti, this is also a reason why this deep perfection of wisdom cannot be written out, or taken up, or borne in mind, or read, or rehearsed, or properly attended to.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang /
translated: This also, Subhuti, should be known for what it is, a deed of Mara.🔽Moreover, Subhuti, the hearer of the Dharma may know the special Dharma of the sutras, the geyas, the vyakarana, the gathas, the udanas, the nidanas, the avadanas, the itivrttakas, the jatakas,🔽the vaipulyas, the adbhutadharmas, the upade-sas, and the dharani gateways,

original: shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la /
analyzed: shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la /
translated: but the expounder of the Dharma may not know them.

original: chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the one who listens to the Dharma is free from craving for desire,🔽free from malice,

original: gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral /
analyzed: gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bral /

analyzed: the tshom dang bral la /
