original: nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
translated: All the bodhisattva great beings in the west who are irreversible

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
translated: will also, for the sake of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who write out this perfection of wisdom,

original: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: recite it, hold it as a scripture, recite it aloud, teach it, properly pay attention to it, and make it widely known, make efforts and take it up.

original: byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
translated: All the bodhisattva great beings in the north who are irreversible

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
translated: will also, for the sake of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who write out this perfection of wisdom,

original: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //🔽byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /🔽rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /🔽klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do // byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: They will make efforts and uphold it for the sake of those who write out, clearly articulate, recite, teach, and properly pay attention to the perfection of wisdom.🔽“The bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible in the northeast will also make efforts and uphold it for the sake of those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family who write out, clearly articulate, recite, teach, and properly pay attention to the perfection of wisdom.

original: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible in the southeast will also make efforts and uphold it for the sake of those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family who write out, clearly articulate, recite, teach, and properly pay attention to the perfection of wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /🔽klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton @108a *//🔽byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton @108a *// byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: “Noble sons and daughters who write out this perfection of wisdom,

original: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
translated: read it, hold it in esteem, recite it, teach it, and properly pay attention to it will be supported and upheld by those irreversible bodhisattva great beings in the southwest.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
translated: “Noble sons and daughters who write out this perfection of wisdom,

original: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: read it, hold it in esteem, recite it, teach it, and properly pay attention to it will be supported and upheld by those irreversible bodhisattva great beings in the northwest.”

original: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /🔽rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
analyzed: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
translated: All the bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible in the northern direction,🔽they too will make an effort and take up the cause of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who write out this perfection of wisdom,

original: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: who read it aloud, who commission it to be read aloud, who memorize it, who teach it, and who properly pay it respect.

original: 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /
translated: All the bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible in the lower direction,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
translated: they too will make an effort and take up the cause of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who write out this perfection of wisdom,🔽who read it aloud, who commission it to be read aloud, who memorize it, who teach it, and who properly pay it respect.

original: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang; kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //🔽steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' @108b sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang /🔽rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
analyzed: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang; kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do // steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' @108b sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing /
translated: They will make an effort and take up the perfection of wisdom for the sake of those who write out, take up, study, read, master, teach, and properly pay attention to it.

original: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don du brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible in the ten directions will also make an effort and take up the perfection of wisdom for the sake of those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family who write out, take up, study, read, master, teach, and properly pay attention to it.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / bud med la la zhig la bu lnga'am /
analyzed: dper na / bud med la la zhig la bu lnga'am /
translated: Suppose a woman has five sons,

original: bcu'am / nyi shu'am /
analyzed: bcu'am / nyi shu'am /
translated: or ten, or twenty,

original: sum cu'am / bzhi bcu'am /
analyzed: sum cu'am / bzhi bcu'am /
translated: or thirty, or forty,

original: lnga bcu'am / brgya'am /🔽stong zhig yod na /
analyzed: lnga bcu'am / brgya'am /🔽stong zhig yod na /
translated: or fifty, or a hundred,🔽or a thousand sons.

original: de dag gi ma de ca nis kyang mi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing; bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad med par 'gyur /
analyzed: de dag gi ma de ca nis kyang mi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing; bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad med par 'gyur /
translated: They will strive to make their mother well, thinking, ‘How can we make our mother well?

original: bdag cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du mi 'gyur /🔽bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bdag cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du mi 'gyur / bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur /
translated: How can we prevent any obstacles to our mother’s health?🔽How can we make our mother live long?

original: bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya /
analyzed: bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya /
translated: What can we do to make our mother live long?

original: bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya na ji ltar bya /
analyzed: bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams med par bya na ji ltar bya /
translated: What can we do to prevent any physical discomfort for our mother?

original: 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa ste /
translated: She is the one who gave birth to us.

original: srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do //
analyzed: srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do //
translated: She is the one who gave us life.’ They will serve their mother well, thinking, ‘She is the one who gave us life.’

original: de dag ni 'di'i srog ga bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo //
analyzed: de dag ni 'di'i srog ga bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo //
translated: ‘May we not be an obstacle to her life.

original: lus nyams chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo //
analyzed: lus nyams chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo //
translated: May her body not become weak.

original: lus la sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrul gyis gtse ba'i mi bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo //
analyzed: lus la sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrul gyis gtse ba'i mi bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo //
translated: May she not be disturbed by flies, mosquitoes, and snakes.’

original: tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dung legs par bya bas phu dud du byed do //
analyzed: tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas mi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dung legs par bya bas phu dud du byed do //
translated: and that they might not be uncomfortable because of heat, cold, hunger, or thirst.

original: de ltar bu de @109a *//
analyzed: de ltar bu de @109a *//
translated: In that way, those children

original: dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o //
analyzed: dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o //
translated: would think of their mother as someone who gave birth to them,

original: 'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun du rim gro byed cing /
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun du rim gro byed cing /
translated: who showed them this world, and would always serve her with all the necessities of happiness,

original: bsti stang dang; bkur sti tsher byed do //
analyzed: bsti stang dang; bkur sti tsher byed do //
translated: and would honor and respect her.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs te /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas always watch over and think about this perfection of wisdom with the buddha eye.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed skyed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed skyed pa'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom gives birth to all our buddhadharmas.

original: 'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o zhes rgyun du gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o zhes rgyun du gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: He always sees and considers the world.

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the eastern direction, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: the Bhagavat Buddhas, as many as they are, Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones, who dwell, who maintain themselves, who teach the Dharma, these Bhagavat Buddhas always see and consider this profound Prajñāpāramitā with the Buddha eye.

original: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i ri klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i ri klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the southern direction, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @109b 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //🔽nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @109b 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas, however many there are, who abide in the western direction, who maintain themselves in the western direction, and who teach the sacred doctrine, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.🔽The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas, however many there are, who abide in the northern direction, who maintain themselves in the northern direction, and who teach the sacred doctrine, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.🔽The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas, however many there are, who abide in the southern direction, who maintain themselves in the southern direction, and who teach the sacred doctrine, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.🔽The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas, however many there are, who abide in the northeastern direction, who maintain themselves in the northeastern direction, and who teach the sacred doctrine, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas, however many there are, who abide in the southeastern direction, who maintain themselves in the southeastern direction, and who teach the sacred doctrine, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.🔽The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the arhats, the completely enlightened buddhas, however many there are, who abide in the southwestern direction, who maintain themselves in the southwestern direction, and who teach the sacred doctrine, those lord buddhas

original: byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the worlds in the northern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: the Bhagavat Buddhas, as many as there are, who are Tathagatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones, who live, remain alive, and maintain themselves, and who teach the Dharma, those Bhagavat Buddhas also, with the Buddha-eye, always and uninterruptedly see and consider this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the worlds in the northeastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //🔽shar lho'i @110a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so // shar lho'i @110a *//

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: The Lord Buddhas, the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the fully Enlightened Ones, however many there are, who abide in the world systems in the eastern direction, who abide in the world systems in the southern direction, who abide in the world systems in the western direction, who abide in the world systems in the northern direction, who abide in the world systems in the northeastern direction, who abide in the world systems in the southeastern direction, who abide in the world systems in the southwestern direction, who abide in the world systems in the northwestern direction, who abide in the world systems below, who abide in the world systems above, those Lord Buddhas, the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the fully Enlightened Ones, those Sugatas, who abide in the world systems in the ten directions, they all have known this deep perfection of wisdom, have fully known it, and have demonstrated it.

original: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In as many world systems as there are sand particles in the river Ganges in the southern-western direction,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzang mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzang mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: the Lord Buddhas, the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the fully Enlightened Ones, those Sugatas, who abide in the world systems in the southern-western direction, they all have known this deep perfection of wisdom, have fully known it, and have demonstrated it.

original: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the worlds in the northwest, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: the Bhagavat Buddhas, as many as there are, who dwell, who live, who maintain themselves, who teach the Dharma, those Tathagatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones, those Bhagavat Buddhas always watch over and consider this profound perfection of wisdom with the eye of the Buddha.

original: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: In the worlds in the downward direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river,

original: de @110b bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de @110b bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: Those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas, however many there are, who live and maintain themselves, and teach the Dharma, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.🔽Those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas, however many there are, who live and maintain themselves, and teach the Dharma, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.

original: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: Those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas, however many there are, who live and maintain themselves, and teach the Dharma, those lord buddhas also constantly and always watch over and consider this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed skyed pa'o //
translated: This is what gives birth to the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di'ang ston ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di'ang ston ston pa'o //
translated: This is what teaches and demonstrates the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas always and constantly look on and watch over this deep perfection of wisdom with the buddha-eye.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di las byung ba ni brtson @111a *//
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di las byung ba ni brtson @111a *//
translated: The perfection of concentration of the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas comes from this.

original: 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance comes from this.

original: 'di las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience comes from this.

original: 'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: From this arises the perfection of morality.

original: 'di las byung ba ni spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽'di las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // 'di las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises the perfection of generosity.🔽From this arises inner emptiness.

original: 'di las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do //🔽'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do // 'di las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises outer emptiness.🔽From this arises inner and outer emptiness.

original: 'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises the emptiness of emptiness.

original: 'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises great emptiness.

original: 'di las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'di las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do // 'di las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽From this arises the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'di las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //🔽'di las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do // 'di las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽From this arises the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: 'di las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: 'di las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: From this arises the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: 'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: From it comes the emptiness of essential nature.

original: 'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: From it comes the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: 'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //🔽'di las byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do // 'di las byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: From it comes the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽From it comes the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: 'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //🔽'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do // 'di las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: From it comes the emptiness of nonthings.🔽From it comes the emptiness of essential nature.

original: 'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: From it comes the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: 'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
translated: From it come the applications of mindfulness.

original: 'di las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so //
translated: From it come the right efforts.

original: 'di las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //🔽@111b 'di las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // @111b 'di las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: From it come the legs of miraculous power.🔽From it come the faculties.

original: 'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni stobs rnams so //
translated: From it come the powers.

original: 'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: From it come the branches of awakening.

original: 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path arises from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
translated: The noble truths arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so //
translated: The dhyānas arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: The immeasurables arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: The formless absorptions arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight liberations arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o //🔽'di las byung ba ni /
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o // 'di las byung ba ni /
translated: The nine serial absorptions arise from it.🔽The emptiness gate of liberation arises from it.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: The signless gate of liberation arises from it.🔽The wishless gate of liberation arises from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so //
translated: The clairvoyances arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: The meditative stabilizations arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
translated: The four fearlessnesses arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o //
translated: Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o //
translated: Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.🔽Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.🔽Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o // 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid do //🔽@112a *// 'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid do // @112a *// 'di las byung ba ni rang byang chub bo //
translated: Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.🔽Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.🔽Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.🔽The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges arise from it.🔽Great love arises from it.🔽Great compassion arises from it.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha arise from it.

original: 'di las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams so //
translated: The ten powers arise from it.🔽The four fearlessnesses arise from it

original: 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so //
translated: Those who have arisen from this are the Once-Returners.

original: 'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams so //
translated: Those who have arisen from this are the Non-Returners.
